descriptionHtml:
I put a Bat file that allows the player to reach the Level 999,  Alchemy 9999, Alteration 9999 Block 9999 Conjuration 9999Destruction 9999
HeavyArmor 9999 Illusion 9999 LightArmor  9999 Marksman 9999 Sneak 9999
Restoration  9999 Speechcraft 9999 TwoHanded 9999 onehanded 9999
lockpicking 9999 Pickpocket  9999 Enchanting 9999 Smithing 16777215
Health 999999999 Magicka  999999999999 Stamina 999999999 carryweight
9999999999999999999999  dragonsouls 999 and  very much gold.

Instalation :  Copy the file to the Skyrim folder (the same which is SkyrimLauncher). In game Press' (BUTTON UP TAB) and enter BAT
SAVE_EDIT, PRESS ENTER
